_description: A tag in an English prose homily

WorcF10.Transcription:
A rulur of al remis rialiche araiedis crist in þat a his a
                    lordþorw riches of his rawnsun riþliche ahaþ vs
                    raisid& mor ouer with þe cristal of charite a haþ vs
                    crownidin þat a haþ ebowth b[ cropped ]
WorcF10.Editions:
Grisdale,  D. M. 
             Three Middle English Sermons from the Worcester Chapter Manuscript
                F.10.
Leeds Texts & Monographs
         5. Kendal: T. Wilson, 1939: 50.
